ingredients: 1 (18 ounce) bottle Bob Evans® Wildfire BBQ Sauce
2 (16 ounce) cans light red kidney beans, drained
1 (2.1 ounce) package Bob Evans® Express Bacon
title: Slow Cooked Wildfire Beans
instructions: Combine all ingredients in slow cooker. Stir well. Cover and cook on low heat for 6 - 8 hours.
